meanings.definition: A person who leases property from a lessee.
meanings.sent1: The sublessees were happy with the apartment they rented.
meanings.sent2: The sublessees signed a contract to rent the office space.
meanings.sent3: The sublessees threw a party to celebrate their new home.
meanings.sent4: The sublessees were like bees buzzing around the hive of the lessee.
meanings.sent5: The sublessees painted the walls of the rental unit a vibrant shade of blue.

meanings.sent1: Several sublessees attended the meeting to discuss the lease terms.
meanings.sent2: The sublessees' names were listed on the rental agreement.
meanings.sent3: The sublessees formed a club for those who sublease properties.
meanings.sent4: The sublessees gathered like a flock of birds migrating for the winter.
meanings.sent5: The sublessees collectively decided to renovate the shared spaces in the building.
